GeometryPlayer3D
----------------

`GeometryPlayer3D` class has several functions:

.. py:function:: GeometryPlayer3D.__init__

   exampletext:Return a list of random ingredients as strings.

   :param kind: Optional "kind" of ingredients.
   :type kind: list[str] or None
   :return: The ingredients list.
   :rtype: list[str]

.. py:function:: GeometryPlayer3D.adjust_dats_points_for_zoom
